  • Calcium Chloride 94-96%
    Formula : CaCl2
    CAS No. :10043-52-4
    Appearance :White Pellet, granule
    CAS No. :Calcium Chloride, salt
    Packaging :25kg/bag
    Place of Origin :Tianjin, China
    FCL :20 MT
    Port of Departure :Tianjin port, China
    Other Name :Calcium Chloride Anhydrate
